system.description:
"O, mighty Star God, I am wreathed in shadow. I am the blade of the Church and the arrow loosed from the bow of the Crown. I am the greatest weapon, the shrike upon the heathens. When I have chosen my prey, I will not stop until they are dead. My head is that of an Astral Owl, and my skin is as black as a starless night. I stand towering over others, and my appendages are slender like branches of trees, and my jaw hangs slack. My bow is my spine. I am the shadow at the corner of thine eyes. Ye are my prey."

(The stats provided here is for a Rank 1 encounter. Check the book for higher ranks.)
system.attacks:
Inflict Violence: Sidereal Rifle. Attack a fighter in range 10 with Faith.

Gambits [[/r d10]]

1-3: Inflict Violence > Inflict Violence > Inflict Violence

4-6: Rush > Inflict Violence > Star Arrow [1]: Inflict 1 Hit on 1 enemy in the battlefield.

7-9: Rush > Heavy Light Javelin [2]: Attack all enemies in line 10 with Bravery + Faith. Any Staggered targets become slowed.

10: Abaddon Maw [3]: Inflict Violence, and then pull 2 all enemies in burst 3 of the target, then set them all aflame and stun them.

traits.name: Glory To The Sidereal Banner
traits.description: Pale steal holy items from the places they colonize. All Pale fighters have +2d to all Attacks and Defenses, though they lose these for the rest of violence the first time they're Staggered.

traits.name: This Land Of Tears
traits.description: The Pale get stronger as they are Staggered, however, as they worship that bleeding god. When Staggered, they gain +1 to Speed and +1 to Jump, and Block 1. They get extra benefits as well.

traits.name: Sidereal Cazador
traits.description: The Hunter's ranged attacks ignore blocking terrain and become True and Skewering against enemies 4+ tiles away. When Staggered, the Hunter can set the origin point of their attacks anywhere in the battlefield
